message.raw:
backporting patches from STABLE branch:
- http://q12.org/pipermail/ode-cvs/2005-July/000193.html
- http://q12.org/pipermail/ode-cvs/2005-July/000194.html

explicitly declare that we're using GCC for appropriate platforms, instead of trying to unreliably detect it.  otherwise we'd miscompile opcode.

message:

- http://q12.org/pipermail/ode-cvs/2005-July/000193.html
